data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pereira-Da-Conceicoa, Lyndall L., Barber-James, Helen M. (2013): Redescription and lectotype designation of the endemic South African mayfly Lestagella penicillata (Barnard, 1932) (Ephemeroptera: Teloganodidae). Zootaxa 3750 (5): 450-464, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.5.2
